user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend and I want to send WhatsApp invitations to all our friends.

TaskList.description: Obtain a valid token for WhatsApp API to authenticate requests.
Validate the phone numbers of friends using the WhatsApp API with the obtained token.
Fetch the profile pictures of the validated phone numbers using the WhatsApp API.
Check the status of a specific phone number using the WhatsApp API.
Prepare and send WhatsApp invitations to all friends based on the validated numbers.
